name: Draconus
description:
Draconus is an arcade platformer where the player gains control of Frognum - a beast similar to a serpent or a dragon. His mission is to destroy the Tyrant Beast, an evil ruler of the dark and dangerous world in which Frognum lives. The main weapon in the game is fire breath, but on his quest Frognum will find many magical artifacts and, thanks to those, gain new powers.

The gameplay is simple. The player just has to explore different screens, incinerate opponents and use artifacts (for example Morph Helix that transforms Frognum into a sea monster, which allows him to swim and fight underwater).

shot.caption: This screen is displayed as the game loads
The load screen is followed by the game's title screen in which the white letters float about in a wave pattern. When all lives have been lost the player is returned here
The game starts here. In the early stages at least the player returns here when a life is lost. No game setup / configuration screens to go through, straight in at the press of a key
Leaping to the left takes the player down a level
Reached the bottom. There's something here to collect
Whatever it was its restored health. The 'S' in the top right was half filled in and now its full again
The green thing on the ground is not the alternate character and has taken away a lot of health. The diamond rain has finished the job. One life gone
Replaying and this time made it past the diamond rain
The next screen. These snow flake things pulsate and move up & down. They seem harmless but are probably best avoided
Oh! It looks as though this is NOT the character who is at home in the water
Replaying. Got past the water pits - there's more than one - and entered this cavern. There's some more snow flake like things in here but they've been no problem so far.
Well that's unexpected. The snow flake things swept down like a blizzard and killed him in a flash!
Game Over. Seems a bit gleeful that the game has won doesn't it. From here the player is taken to the game's title screen
